product.name: 76 inch Bifold Barn Door Hardware Track Kit for Four 18 inch Closet Doors,Top Mount Sliding System,Heavy Duty Roller,Smoothly and Quietly,Black(Bifold Door Not Included)
product.description:
Q: Can doors slide to both side of the rail?
A: No, roller on the end of the rail is fixed.
Q: When do you need a headboard?
A: 1.If the studs don't line up with the pre-drilled holes in the rail. 2.If there is a doorway trim.
Q: Does this come with door or just the hardware?
A: Package only includes hardware for bifold door. Door is not included.
Q: Can hollow core doors work with this product?
A: Roller disc and floor guide need to be installed in solid wood.
product.bullet_points:
• Package List: 76 inch track (multiple tracks),4 x pulley,2 x pulley fixator,4 x pulley base,5 x spacer,2 x floor guide,6 x hinge,1 x Sealing Strip. All necessary parts are included.（DOOR IS NOT INCLUDED.）
• Installation Tips: The total width of the door panel should be track length - 4". This top mounted bifold barn door hardware fits door thickness from 1" to 1-3/4". And each door should not weigh more than 88 lbs.
• Product Advantage: Compared with traditional barn door hardware, bifold barn door hardware track is space saving and can be used in a variety of living situations, such as closet, pantry, etc.
• Excellent Quality: Finosen bifold barn door hardware kit is made of high-quality aluminum steel with premium nylon roller pulley,coated with black powder surface,which ensure the features as corrosion,rust-resistant,durable and sturdy.And maintains its beauty and longevity for many years.
• 24 Hours Stand By: The package contains all accessories and one copy of step-by-step installation manual.You can also get professional support within 24 hours from our service team.
